```py
CREATE TABLE students
  (
     id          INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
     NAME        VARCHAR(255),
     subject     VARCHAR(30),
     final_marks INT
  ); 
```

```py
INSERT INTO Students (id, name, subject, final_marks)

```

```py
SELECT *,
       Rank()
         OVER (
           ORDER BY final_marks DESC) AS 'ranks'
FROM   students;
```

```py
SELECT *,
       Rank()
         OVER (
           PARTITION BY subject
           ORDER BY final_marks DESC) AS 'ranks'
FROM   students;
```

```py
SELECT *,
       DENSE_RANK()
         OVER (
           PARTITION BY subject
           ORDER BY final_marks DESC) AS 'ranks'
FROM   students;
```

```py
NTILE(n) OVER (PARTITION BY c1, c2 ORDER BY c3)
```

```py
SELECT *,
       NTILE(3)
         OVER (
           ORDER BY final_marks DESC) AS bucket
FROM   students; 
```

```py
SELECT *,
       CUME_DIST()
         OVER (
           ORDER BY final_marks) AS cum_dis
FROM   students; 
```

```py
SELECT *,
       CUME_DIST()
         OVER (
           PARTITION BY subject
           ORDER BY final_marks) AS cum_dis
FROM   students; 
```

```py
SELECT *,
       STDDEV(final_marks)
         OVER (
           PARTITION BY subject) AS marks_stddev,
       VARIANCE(final_marks)
         OVER (
           PARTITION BY subject) AS marks_variance
FROM   students; 
```

```py
SELECT *,
       FIRST_VALUE(col1)
         OVER (
           PARTITION BY col2, col3
           ORDER BY col4) AS first_value
FROM   table_name
```
